changes_summary: These commits primarily focus on the Factor Form feature with multiple enhancements including OTP tracking, dynamic subscription cadence, and cart-service migration cleanup. Additional work includes TPT (The Pet Team) project improvements for reactivation flows, delivery details, and navigation updates, along with infrastructure changes like Cypress test fixes and Contentful integration updates.

features.name: Factor Form OTP Tracking
features.description: Separated OTP subscription from OTP tracking functionality and removed Statsig configuration in favor of direct config

features.name: Dynamic Subscription Cadence
features.description: Replaced static cadence values with dynamic subscription cadence values

features.name: Factor Form Sub-Brand Hook
features.description: Created sub-brand hook and added Brand support

features.name: Factor Form Tag Component
features.description: Added Tag component for use by FilterButtons.tsx and Filters.tsx

features.name: PlansInfo Component on Reactivation
features.description: Added PlansInfo component to the reactivation page

features.name: Streamlined QA Review Command Package
features.description: Added new package for streamlined QA review commands

features.name: Seamless Logic Removal
features.description: Deleted seamless logic from the codebase

decisions.what: Remove Statsig for Factor Form OTP configuration
decisions.rationale: Moving to direct configuration instead of feature flag service

decisions.what: Migrate from static to dynamic subscription cadence
decisions.rationale: Enable more flexible subscription cadence handling

decisions.what: Remove Factor Form cart-service feature hook
decisions.rationale: Clean up after cart-service migration completion

decisions.what: Migrate price selector to use price endpoint
decisions.rationale: Standardize price data retrieval through dedicated endpoint

decisions.what: Hide navigation items for cancelled subscriptions due to death
decisions.rationale: Improve UX by removing irrelevant options for deceased pets

refactors.reason: Migration completed, cleaning up feature flags and references

refactors.impact: Delivery details component and related functionality
Team ownership files and claims configuration

refactors.reason: Update guard conditions for project heaven dashboard

fixes.issue: Cypress configuration in MR reactivation tests

entities.name: Factor Form
entities.context: Major feature receiving multiple updates for OTP, cadence, cart-service migration, and filtering

entities.name: cart-service
entities.context: Migration completed, references being cleaned up

entities.name: Statsig
entities.context: Being removed from Factor Form OTP configuration

entities.name: Contentful
entities.context: Added keys for delivery details component and payment fraud error entry

entities.name: Reactivation Page
entities.context: Receiving PlansInfo component and Cypress test fixes

entities.name: TPT (The Pet Team)
entities.context: Multiple updates including navigation, delivery details, and team references

entities.name: Price Endpoint
entities.context: Now being used by price selector instead of previous implementation

entities.name: Project Heaven Dashboard
entities.context: New dashboard implementation with multi-pet guard updates

key_patterns: Feature flag cleanup pattern: removing feature flags after successful migrations (Statsig, cart-service)
Component extraction pattern: creating reusable components (Tag, PlansInfo) for shared functionality
Configuration migration: moving from static to dynamic configurations (cadence values)
Conditional UI rendering: hiding navigation based on subscription state (death cancellations)
API consolidation: migrating to centralized endpoints (price endpoint)
Team ownership updates: systematic renaming of team references across codebase
Contentful-driven content: expanding use of Contentful for error messages and component content
